name: kaspersky-security-center
label: Kaspersky Security Center
description: Kaspersky Security Center makes it easy to manage and secure both physical and virtual endpoints from a single, unified management console.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: URL of the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Server Port
fields.description: Port of the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_port
fields.tooltip: Port of the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username to access the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username
fields.tootlip: Username to access the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password to access the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password
fields.tooltip: Password to access the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to true.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to true.

operations.title: Get Host List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all hosts located in a specific group from the Kaspersky Security Center based on the group ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the group based on which to retrieve a list of all host details from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: group_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the group based on which to retrieve a list of all host details from Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get Host Details
operations.description: Retrieves a host details from the Kaspersky Security Center based on the host ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Host ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the host based on which to retrieve host details from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: host_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the host based on which to retrieve host details from Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get Host Group Static Info
operations.description: Retrieves a host group static info from the Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get Software Installed on Specific Host
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all software details installed on a workstation from the Kaspersky Security Center based on the workstation hostname that you have specified.

parameters.title: Workstation Hostname (KLHST_WKS_HOSTNAME)
parameters.description: Specify the workstation hostname based on which to retrieve details of installed software from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: host_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the workstation hostname based on which to retrieve details of installed software from Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get Products Installed
operations.description: Retrieves a kaspersky product details installed on a specific host from the Kaspersky Security Center based on the host ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Host ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the host based on which to retrieve product details from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: host_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the host based on which to retrieve product details from Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Add Group
operations.description: Create a new administration group in Kaspersky Security Center based on the group parent ID and group name that you have specified.

parameters.title: Group Parent ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the parent group within which to create a new group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the parent group within which to create a new group in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Group Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the group being created in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the group being created in Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get All Groups Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of all groups from the Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Move Host to Specific Group
operations.description: Move Host from one group to another in Kaspersky Security Center based on the new group ID and the hostname that you have specified.

parameters.title: New Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the group ID within which to move the host in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: newgroup
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group ID within which to move the host in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Host Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the host to move within the specified group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: pHostNames
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the host to move within the specified group in Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Delete Specific Group
operations.description: Deletes an specific administrative group in the Kaspersky Security Center based on the group ID and value that you have specified.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the group to delete from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: group_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the group to delete from Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Flag
parameters.description: Select a delete flag based on which to delete this group in Kaspersky Security Center. You can choose from the following options: Delete group only if it is empty, Delete group and its subgroups, policies, and tasks or Delete group and its subgroups, hosts, policies, and tasks.
parameters.name: flag
parameters.value: Delete group only if it is empty
options: Delete group only if it is empty
Delete group and its subgroups, policies, and tasks
Delete group and its subgroups, hosts, policies, and tasks
parameters.tooltip: Select a delete flag based on which to delete this group in Kaspersky Security Center. You can choose from the following options: Delete group only if it is empty, Delete group and its subgroups, policies, and tasks or Delete group and its subgroups, hosts, policies, and tasks.

operations.title: Add Policy
operations.description: Create New Policy and assigned to specific Group in Kaspersky Security Center based on the policy name, product name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Policy Display Name
parameters.description: Specify the display name of the policy to create in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_DN
parameters.tooltip: Specify the display name of the policy to create in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Policy Product Name
parameters.description: Specify the product name of the policy being created in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_PRODUCT
parameters.tooltip: Specify the product name of the policy being created in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Policy Product Version
parameters.description: Specify the product version of the policy being created in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_VERSION
parameters.tooltip: Specify the product version of the policy being created in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Policy GROUP ID
parameters.description: Specify the group ID of the policy being created in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_GROUP_ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group ID of the policy being created in Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get All Policies on Specific Group
operations.description: Retrieves a policies located in specified group from the Kaspersky Security Center based on the group ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the group to retrieve its policies from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: group_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the group to retrieve its policies from Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get Specific Policy
operations.description: Retrieve a specific policy from the Kaspersky Security Center based on the policy ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the policy to retrieve its details from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the policy to retrieve its details from Kaspersky Security Center.
